meanings.definition: A type of footwear, typically made of leather or rubber.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new pair of janns for hiking.
meanings.sent2: She wore her favorite janns to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The janns danced off the shelf and onto my feet!
meanings.sent4: His janns were like armor protecting him from the rough terrain.
meanings.sent5: The smell of leather from the janns filled the room.

meanings.definition: A slang term for jeans or pants.
meanings.sent1: He prefers to wear comfortable janns on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of stylish janns for the party.
meanings.sent3: The janns seemed to have a mind of their own, always finding a way to get dirty.
meanings.sent4: Her janns were a symbol of her laid-back attitude.
meanings.sent5: The color of his janns matched perfectly with his shirt.

meanings.definition: A slang term for money or currency.
meanings.sent1: He saved up all his janns to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: She found some extra janns in her pocket.
meanings.sent3: The janns in his wallet seemed to disappear faster than he could earn them.
meanings.sent4: Her janns were like magic, able to buy anything she desired.
meanings.sent5: The sound of janns clinking together was music to his ears.
